jobs.description:
Çalışma Şekli: Tam Zamanlı / Remote (Korona sürecinde)
Ofis Lokasyonu: Beşiktaş Akaretler (Korona sonrası ofise dönüş)
Teknolojiler: VueJS, Bootstrap, Web Api, HTML/CSS, Javascript/Jquery AJAX

Join us and be a part of this exciting opportunity!

Our purpose is to create the most positive impact in our country and ecosystem by enabling commerce, empowered by technology! We are a Tech company - Technology is the driver, ecommerce is the outcome.

Founded in 2010, we are the largest and fastest growing mobile commerce company in Turkey and the MENA region, the largest internet employer in Turkey with a team of ca. 2000 people. In 2018, we have announced an investment and strategic partnership with Alibaba Group which also is the largest internet sector investment in Turkey to date.

Our culture is at the core of everything we do. Focused on results, keeping our customers first, we always work for better and always test, iterate and improve. We learn from our mistakes, direct and open feedback is at the core of our culture.

We are scaling fast and profitably, expanding into international markets. If you want to learn, grow and deliver, if you are results-oriented, love teamwork, appreciate open communication, learning and iteration, and making decisions with data, Come, join our tribe!

Technology Department is one of the most important teams at Trendyol which is future-oriented, fast-growing and technology enthusiast company. Software Development Team builds scalable, high performing platforms for our customer satisfaction by using up-to-date and efficient technologies. In the end, we are all working towards the same goal: to create an excellent experience for our customers at Trendyol.

YOUR PROFILE
* BS degree in Computer, Software or Mathematical Engineering or relevant departments,
* 5+ years of frontend development work
* Strong JavaScript programming skills
* Hands-on experience in React.js, Angular.js, Vue.js, or similar technologies
* Hands-on experience in build tools (Gulp, Webpack, System.js)
* Experience in REST / stateless API design and microservices architectural style
* Experience in Stylus, Sass, or LESS
* Writing automation with cypress is a big plus
* Writing automated tests is a plus
* OOP, MVC knowledge is a plus
* NodeJs knowledge is a must
* Being an Agile minded team player, having good communication skills
* Eagerness on self-improvement, open-minded, future-oriented
* Strong analytical, problem solving, debugging, and troubleshooting skills
* Preferably experienced in e-commerce domain
* Preferably experienced in web sites that work under high user loads
* Technical English proficiency is a must

YOUR CHALLENGE
* As a SCRUM team member, technically analyzing and developing business and web applications
* Working closely with product managers, UX designers and experienced engineers to develop creative solutions for our 12 million+ customers
* Continuously improving and applying technical skills on various platforms
* Being a part of code review and pair programming activities

WHAT’S IN IT FOR YOU?
* Take responsibility from day one, improve your skills and learn continuously.
* We have open communication, teamwork and promote servant leadership. We value talent, not titles!
* Chance to shape the future of e-commerce with us and experience agility at its best!
* Working in an engaging workplace and being part of our cross-functional, diversified, and dynamic team.
* Don’t forget to have fun while we work, we work hard play hard, open office and happy hours :)
* The personal data you submit will be processed in accordance with our privacy policy.

Join us and be a part of this exciting opportunity!

Our purpose is to create the most positive impact in our country and ecosystem by enabling commerce, empowered by technology! We are a Tech company - Technology is the driver, e-commerce is the outcome.

Founded in 2010, we are the largest and fastest-growing mobile commerce company in Turkey and the MENA region, the largest internet employer in Turkey with a team of ca. 2000 people. In 2018, we have announced an investment and strategic partnership with Alibaba Group which also is the largest internet sector investment in Turkey to date.

Our culture is at the core of everything we do. Focused on results, keeping our customers first, we always work for better and always test, iterate, and improve. We learn from our mistakes, direct and open feedback is at the core of our culture.

We are scaling fast and profitably, expanding into international markets. If you want to learn, grow, and deliver, if you are results-oriented, love teamwork, appreciate open communication, learning, and iteration, and making decisions with data, Come, join our tribe!

Technology Department is one of the most important teams at Trendyol which is a future-oriented, fast-growing, and technology enthusiast company. Software Development Team builds scalable, high performing platforms for our customer satisfaction by using up-to-date and efficient technologies. In the end, we are all working towards the same goal: to create an excellent experience for our customers at Trendyol.

YOUR PROFILE
* Team Player - humble, life long learner and has customer-first mindset.
* Practical knowledge about OOP, Design Patterns, Clean Code, Craftsmanship culture, Refactoring, and Unit Testing.
* Experience in at least one of the languages such as Java, Go, C#, Scala
* Experience in Relational / NonRelational Database Management Systems such as Postgresql, ElasticSearch, Couchbase, etc
* Experience in messaging software such as Kafka, RabbitMq
* Experience in Continuous Delivery and build pipelines.
* Experience building Restful backend services using popular frameworks such as Spring Boot.
* Being an Agile minded team player with good communication skills.
* Preferably experienced in distributed architecture with fault tolerance and loose coupling.
* Kubernetes experience and Performance Monitoring is a big plus.
* Good command of written and spoken English.
* Ankara and İzmir starting with remote.

YOUR CHALLENGE
* You will be coding new features and improve existing platform to improve the Trendyol platform experience and scale. 
* You will continuously improve yourself with your team members learning new technologies and acquiring new skills.
* You will participate in planning meetings, estimate tasks, do code reviews and code in pairs.

WHAT’S IN IT FOR YOU?
* Take responsibility from day one, improve your skills and learn continuously.
* We have open communication, teamwork and promote servant leadership. We value talent, not titles!
* Chance to shape future of e-commerce with us and experience agility at its best!
* Working in an engaging workplace and being part of our cross-functional, diversified and dynamic team.
* Don’t forget to have fun while we work, we work hard play hard, open office and happy hours :)
The personal data you submit will be processed in accordance with our privacy policy.

Want to join us? Happy to receive your online application!

Join us and be a part of this exciting opportunity!

Our purpose is to create the most positive impact in our country and ecosystem by enabling commerce, empowered by technology! We are a Tech company - Technology is the driver, e-commerce is the outcome.

Founded in 2010, we are the largest and fastest-growing mobile commerce company in Turkey and the MENA region, the largest internet employer in Turkey with a team of ca. 2000 people. In 2018, we have announced an investment and strategic partnership with Alibaba Group which also is the largest internet sector investment in Turkey to date.

Our culture is at the core of everything we do. Focused on results, keeping our customers first, we always work for better and always test, iterate, and improve. We learn from our mistakes, direct and open feedback is at the core of our culture.

We are scaling fast and profitably, expanding into international markets. If you want to learn, grow, and deliver, if you are results-oriented, love teamwork, appreciate open communication, learning, and iteration, and making decisions with data, Come, join our tribe!

Technology Department is one of the most important teams at Trendyol which is a future-oriented, fast-growing, and technology enthusiast company. Software Development Team builds scalable, high performing platforms for our customer satisfaction by using up-to-date and efficient technologies. In the end, we are all working towards the same goal: to create an excellent experience for our customers at Trendyol.

YOUR PROFILE
* BS or MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related field
* QA Engineer / Software Test Engineer experience is a plus
* Knowledge of automated testing frameworks and languages (Selenium WebDriver,  Appium, JUnit, Cucumber, Espresso, JS test frameworks, etc.)
* Strong experience writing & maintaining automated test scripts for web applications
* Experience with API automation testing including unit test automation frameworks
* Knowledge on Java, Python
* Knowledge on SQL
* Proactive attitude in identifying issues and solutions that help in improving Software Quality
* Good command of written and spoken English
* Comfortable working in a dynamic, low-structure, constantly changing atmosphere and prioritizing work appropriately
* Excellent problem solving, critical thinking, and debugging skills
* Curious, a meticulous observer who executes test cases creatively and innovative
* Speaking up when something just doesn’t feel right w/productive feedback

YOUR CHALLENGE
* Identify, analyze, and document any defects discovered during testing and provide fine tuning recommendations
* Develop and lead the automation strategy/effort and generate scripts to perform automated testing cycles
* Execute and analysis automation test results
* Work with cross-functional teams to ensure quality throughout the software development lifecycle
* Define test strategy and provide technical guidance in driving quality in new feature development
* Break applications in ways the developers never thought about

WHAT’S IN IT FOR YOU?
* Take responsibility from day one, improve your skills and learn continuously.
* We have open communication, teamwork and promote servant leadership. We value talent, not titles!
* Chance to shape the future of e-commerce with us and experience agility at its best!
* Working in an engaging workplace and being part of our cross-functional, diversified, and dynamic team.
* Don’t forget to have fun while we work, we work hard play hard, open office and happy hours :)

The personal data you submit will be processed in accordance with our privacy policy.

Want to join us? Happy to receive your online application!

Dünyada ve ülkemizde lider içecek markasının Ümraniye/İstanbul merkezindeki yazılım ekibinde görev alacak;

🖇️ Manuel test süreçlerinde 2 sene deneyimli,
🖇️ Tüm test case’lerin yazılması, bug’ların açılması ve bugfix takibi yapacak,
🖇️ UAT testlerinde kullanıcılara yol gösterecek /onlarla birlikte test yapabilecek,
🖇️ Scrum sprintleri içerisinde kabul testlerini yapacak Test Mühendisi arıyoruz. 

Görüşmelerimizin tümünü dijital yapıyoruz, pandemi süresince uzaktan çalışma modeli uygulanıyor.

IoT Teknoloji Uzmanı arıyoruz.(En az 2 sene deneyimli)

Dijital ve analitik konulardaki en karmaşık problemleri çözmeye destek sağlayan müşterimizin Çamlıca/İstanbul Genel Merkezindeki ekibi için;

✔️IoT projelerinde satış öncesi teknik analizler yapacak,
✔️Geçmiş tecrübesinde şartname cevaplama, kapsam belirleme, PoC testi yapma, teklif hazırlama, müşteriye sunum yapma gibi beceriler geliştirmiş,
✔️Proaktif hareket edip insiyatif kullanabilecek ve kısa sürelerde hızlı hareket edilmesi gereken ortamlarda çalışmaya istekli IoT Teknoloji Uzmanı arıyoruz. 

➕Yazılım, analiz kökenli tecrübe, örgün öğretim lisans mezuniyeti ve ileri seviyede İngilizce iletişim becerisi ön koşuldur.
➕Pandemi sebebiyle uzaktan çalışılmaktadır ve tüm görüşmelerimizin tümünü dijital yapıyoruz.

Php Yazılım Uzmanı arıyoruz. (En az 2 sene deneyimli)

2000 yılı itibari ile Türkiye yazılım sektöründe faaliyet gösteren özgün oyun sitesi olan müşterimizin yazılım ekibine dahil olacak;

🖇️ PHP 5.6, PHP 7 ile çalışmış,
🖇️ Laravel, Codeigniter frameworklerinde deneyimli Php Developer arıyoruz.

✔️Pandemi sebebiyle uzaktan çalışılmakta, bu model pandemi bitiminde de devam edebilir. 
✔️Tam zamanlı ve yarı zamanlı çalışma modeli uygulanmaktadır, başvuruların tümü değerlendirilecektir. 
✔️Görüşmelerimizin tümünü dijital yapıyoruz

• Experience with nodeJS
• Experience with React / Vue.js
• NoSQL Database Knowledge
• Knowledge or interest in ElasticSearch

Dijital ve analitik konulardaki en karmaşık problemleri çözmeye destek sağlayan müşterimiz için Software Developer arıyoruz.

♦Pandemi süresince uzaktan çalışılmakta.
♦Belirsiz süreli iş anlaşması yapılmaktadır.

·        3+ years in teams applying modern agile software development practices
·        B.Sc. in Computer Science or related Engineering is required, a Masters degree is desirable
·        Proven skills in web and mobile application development for IoT-based platforms is a plus
·        Experience working in CI, CD pipelines in terms of scripting and integration with git repository and Git Workflows is a plus.
·        Practical knowledge of container solutions (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes,)
·        Hands on experience on Object Oriented Design & Design Patterns & Test-Driven Development
·        Proven track-record in software implementation in a developer role
·        Working in high-scalable and available backend service solutions
·        Excellent expertise in object-oriented programming (C# required) and one or more of NodeJS, JavaScript and Shell scripting
·        Excellent expertise in HTML, CSS and VueJS
·        Preferably experienced in Cassandra, ELK, Redis, RabbitMQ, ElasticSearch and RDBMS, or similar technologies at least
·        Experience in Micro-service technologies and/or RESTful Web services
·        Experience in MQTT, AMQP, TCP/IP, OPC or any other messaging technologies
·        Excellent communication skills: writing well, speaking well, and listening well
·        Strong problem solving and analytical skills
·        Passionate for developing simple, clean and attractive code
·        Participating in the full agile project lifecycle by designing, storyboarding, prototyping, developing, testing, deploying, and implementing custom business applications using the latest tools and technologies
·        No military obligation for male candidates or postponed for at least 2 years
·        Experience with source control (Git)
·        Experience with Agile Method

Dijital ve analitik konulardaki en karmaşık problemleri çözmeye destek sağlayan müşterimiz için Front End Developer arıyoruz.

Good understanding of HTML5 and CSS3
Aware of the interplay between JavaScript and HTML & CSS, and able to dynamically create, modify, and style elements on a page with ease
Understanding of all major browsers and mobile environments
Experience with both consuming and designing RESTful APIs
Familiarity with server-side MVC web frameworks,
Ability to write efficient, secure, well-documented, and clean JavaScript code
Highly proficient with the JavaScript language and its modern ES6+ syntax and features
Highly proficient with the JavaScript language and its modern TypeScript syntax and features
Building modular and reusable components and libraries
Modern JavaScript frameworks (Vue.js, React or Angular) experience preferred
Staying up-to-date with all recent developments in the JavaScript and Vue.js space
Developing user-facing applications using Vue.js
Minimum of 2 years working on production Vue projects
Deep knowledge of the Vue router and routing system
Highly proficient with Vue.js framework and its core principles such as components, reactivity, and the virtual DOM
Familiarity with the Vue.js ecosystem, including Vue CLI, Vuex, Vue Router, and Nuxt.js
Experience with source control (Git)
Experience with Agile Method

Dünyada ve ülkemizde lider içecek markasının Ümraniye/İstanbul merkezindeki yazılım ekibinde görev alacak;

✔️ İleri seviyede SQL bilgisine sahip,
✔️ Python veya başka herhangi bir komut dosyası / programlama dili hakkında temel bilgi sahibi (veya Python öğrenmeye istekli),
✔️ IBM DataStage ETL aracı tecrübesine sahip,
✔️Tercihen Apache Airflow'da deneyimli, 
✔️Tercihen SAP ekosistemindeki deneyimli (SAP DataServices, BO, BW) Veri Mühendisi aramaktayız. 

➕Pandemi sebebiyle uzaktan çalışılmaktadır ve tüm görüşmelerimizin tümünü dijital yapıyoruz

About Bytelus:

Bytelus has the mission of “to produce products that will benefit the future of the world, the human race to reach a higher level with the revolutionary power of technology, and to support scientific and technological activities for this mission” and to serve this mission; Bytelus is a technology company established with the vision of developing and operating digital ventures and projects within its own structure. Born in Antalya, Turkey on 27 May 2020, established in Tallinn, Estonia on 26.11.2020 as a private limited company; Bytelus OÜ.

Bytelus born after Radiolize’s success, which became a global cloud SaaS that operates in digital audio streaming. Since we had more crazy ideas and strived to do more, instead of creating a conventional company called Radiolize, we created a roof company for our projects. The name comes from “Byte” and “Zeus” which also reminds us the lovely place Olympos in Antalya / Turkey. Also, that’s why we call our offices “Home of the Zeus of Bytes”.

We are trying to do revolutionary disruptive things other people think are crazy but we are super excited about. We know how hard it is, that’s why our motto is “ad astra per aspera”, which is a popular Latin phrase meaning “a rough road leads to the stars.”

About Radiolize:

Radiolize.com is a growing venture of Bytelus Labs. It's a SaaS (Software as a service) that people can create, run and manage their own online radio stations. In the market since July 2019.

Radiolize provides all-in-one modern digital solutions for online audio broadcasting. Users can manage and broadcast their online radios and on-demand audio files from anywhere, anytime, any device. It's based on cloud technology. You can check more at radiolize.com

Location: Antalya Office or Remote

Responsibilities and Duties:

In this role, you'll be scaling, automating and operating our current Docker infrastructure with container orchestration platforms. Set and automate the deployment, configuration, and management of complex cloud environments.

Skills & Experiences:

- A desire to automate everything and the wisdom to know when not to
- Major cloud provider tooling (AWS, Azure, GCP, Bare-Metal)
- Deep knowledge of Linux distros: deployment, management, and security
- One or more container orchestration tools, platforms and frameworks (Kubernetes, Knative, Istio, Envoy)
- Docker
- Technical troubleshooting and problem-solving skills
- Design, develop, test, deploy, maintain and improve in an agile environment.
- CI/CD, Git tools
- Awareness and or experience with cyber-security best practices, tools, procedures, coding standards, use of third-party software, etc.
- A well-organized team player, having good communication skills.
- Understanding of PHP backend is a plus but not must

We Offer:

- Fantastic working environment built on the principles of scrum and self-organization
- Fun, happy and politics-free work culture
- Optionally, a room in our house of core developers in Antalya which is across the beautiful full-mountain view, 10 minutes walking to Konyaalti Plaji
- No dress code, corporate speak or middle managers
- Be an essential part of promising venture

Hello guys! We are currently looking for a DevOps Engineer.

Responsibilities and Duties:

In this role, you'll be scaling, automating and operating our current Docker infrastructure with container orchestration platforms or virtualization tools. Set and automate the deployment, configuration, and management of cloud environments.

Skills & Experiences:

- A desire to automate everything and the wisdom to know when not to
- Major cloud provider tooling (AWS, Azure, GCP, Bare-Metal)
- Deep knowledge of Linux distros: deployment, management, and security
- Knowledge on container orchestration tools, platforms and frameworks (Kubernetes, Knative, Istio, Envoy)
- Virtualization (KVM, VMWare etc.)
- Docker
- Technical troubleshooting and problem-solving skills
- Design, develop, test, deploy, maintain and improve in an agile environment.
- Awareness and or experience with cyber-security best practices, tools, procedures, coding standards, use of third-party software, etc.
- A well-organized team player, having good communication skills.
- Understanding of PHP backend is a plus but not must
